title: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Here are answers to some common questions

faqs.question: Can you work with clients remotely?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! I have experience working with clients from all around the world. Through effective communication channels such as email, video calls, and project management tools, I ensure seamless collaboration regardless of geographical location.
